div.div: Free Lunches Monday and Thursday to ALL Lowellville Students

div.a: Board meeting to be broadcast live

span.p:
REGULARMEETING NOTICE
Wednesday, April 22, 2020
LOWELLVILLE LOCAL BOARD OF EDUCATION NOTICE OF LIVE-STREAM MEETING OF THE LOWELLVILLELOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICT BOARD OF EDUCATION DURINGSTATE OF EMERGENCY AND PUBLIC HEALTH ORDERS RELATED TO COVID-19 To comply with the Governors orders of March 12, 14, and 23, 2020, related to the state of emergency related to COVID-19, andpursuant to related guidance issued by the Ohio Attorney General.

p.br:
On April 22, 2020 at 7:00 P.M. the Lowellville Board of Education will be live-streamed via Zoom. Those wishing to address the board during its regular meeting must submit a request to Treasurer Linda Molinaro by 6:30 PM on April 22, 2020 via email
at l.molinaro@lowellvilleschool.org
The request will include name and address of the participant, group affiliation if applicable, and topic.

span.p:
The meetings can be accessed through the Zoom link below.
Join Zoom Meeting
https://zoom.us/j/353458228?pwd=TkpkSzlDWHFacTFYR05tYm5STGRSdz09

Lowellville Local School is aware that we are all facing unprecedented times. We hope that your families are staying safe. We want to offer any of our students in need of personal hygiene products (shampoo, soap, tooth paste, etc.) to come to the Baseball Field Pavilion on Monday and Thursday from 9:30am-10:30 am. Please email Mrs. Wilson RN, if youre interested, atb.wilson@lowellvilleschool.org

div.a: Mahoning County Public Health Department Message

span.p: This is a message from Mahoning County Public Health The United States, Ohio,
and our Tri-County area are being impacted by the COVID-19 virus.

If you would like to purchase a class photo the cost is $6.00 for a 5x7 and $10.00 for an 8x10
Order forms can be picked up by students or parents in the office.

div.a: Mrs. DeLuca's 7th Grade Language Arts Class and Jesse McClain Holocaust Survivor

img.alt: The Henry H. Stambaugh Concert Band presented its fall concert on November 19. Students audition for this group in September and rehearse once a week during the school year. Congratualtions to Lowellville band members John Cheliras, Alessandra Montanez, and Dylan David for earning spots in this group.
